I can Answer all the quires you have about our college

BMSIT&M, an Institution with a class of its own, is one of the most sought after institutes for high quality engineering education in the state.

 It is a well established private engineering college in bangalore recognized by the AICTE, Government of India and is affiliated to the Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belagavi, Karnataka, India. 

Visit "https://bmsit.ac.in/administration?of=1" to know more

Dr. Mohan Babu G N
Principal, BMSIT&M
